resources.string:
Press the button to connect or disconnect this device.

After you have signed on, you can press Symptoms to start tracking your symptoms.

If you have a problem tracking your symptoms and are redirected to this panel, then please try to disconnect and connect again.
Symptoms: Press this to add your symptoms.
Report: Press this to see your symptom report.
It may take a few seconds to load report page.\nIf report is not loaded, please check your WIFI connection.

Please note that if you disconnect your device, you will not be able to track your symptoms.

To track again, you need to reconnect, reauthenticate and reauthorize this app.

Do you want to disconnect?
Please input your symptoms on a scale of 0 to 10
